text: 12:24 Jenesis 4:10; Hibru 8:6; 10:22; 11:4; 1 Pita 1:2Ia Iesusra bato, an abuir gumazir God ko en tighɨn itim, egha Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiam gami. Egha ia Iesusɨn ghuzimɨn otifi, a fomɨra Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiar kam gavgavim a danɨngasa a kavkɨni. Ezɨ ghuzir kamra akar aghuim e mɨkɨri, fomɨra Abelɨn ghuzim akam akunizɨ moghɨn an amir Puvatɨ. Iesusɨn ghuzim akar bar aghuim akuri, ezɨ akar kam Abelɨn ghuzimɨn akam gafira.
